s: Minute Rice has plain white rice, brown rice, and jasmine rice and flavored rice like jalapeno rice and herb-and-chicken rice to help you make any dish special.

t: Amazon.com : Minute Brown Rice, Instant Brown Rice for Quick Meals, 14-Ounce Box : Brown Rice Produce : Grocery & Gourmet Food
s: It cooks easily (of course, it's Minute Rice), and the flavor is good, but it's the texture I don't care for. I've tried using more water when cooking, but that didn't seem to help. I can use it in recipes where rice is more incorporated with other ingredients, and that's okay, but served practically on it's own... again, it's the texture that's off-putting to me. I'll finish using the box, but I'll try another brand ...

t: r/cookingforbeginners on Reddit: Why does minute rice get such a bad rap?
